subject: Plus X Pedals Haptic Reactor
description_text:
Hi everybody at Simsonn,

I'm looking to upgrade my pedals to some Plus X Racing pedals and would
also like haptic reactors alongside them.

On the basis that I have a very large gift card balance on Amazon, I am
looking at purchasing the pedals there. However, doing it on Amazon I have
to purchase the Haptic Reactors and the Pedals separately rather than
together when you go direct.

Would you be able to please confirm if I buy the pedals from Amazon whether
they have the capability to add the Haptic Reactors to the pedals?

Thanks very much for your help.

conversations.body_text: Hi Dan Jones,  May I know which country you are located in? I will ask our operations team to provide you with the corresponding Amazon link.
Hi there, I am based in the UK
Hi Dan Jones,    Don't worry, all pedals purchased through our official channels are the same and support Haptic Reactors. You can purchase them separately.

Hi all,

I am glad to say I did end up purchasing - just awaiting arrival now!

I am also looking at purchasing a sim rig and want to ensure the pedals can
fit onto the rig. I've contacted one of the companies that I'm interested
in purchasing with to see if Simsonn pedals are compatible.

Firstly, would you be able to confirm that this baseplate:
https://www.simsonn.com/products/baseplate?variant=50673233658170 is the
same as those that come with the pedals when bought together? That's the
measurements we've provisionally taken it from.

The rig manufacturer has also asked me for the diameter of the spaces
highlighted in green and if they are M8 or not. That would be really
helpful if you can share that information when you are able to get it to me.

Thanks for your help!

[image: image.png]

On Mon, Aug 25, 2025 at 4:06 AM service@simsonn.com
Hello, this is our latest baseplate size information. We have updated the link.

Thank you so much,

I ordered last week so I presume this is the base plate it comes with? Can
I also please check the diameter of the mounting holds on the side and if
they require M8?

Thanks for your support.

On Thu, Sep 4, 2025 at 10:35 AM service@simsonn.com
Correct, the side screws are M8, and the pedal mounting screws are M6.

Thank you and sorry for the continued emails.

Would you be able to please confirm the measurements of the smaller side
holes in height and width? The rig manufacturer has asked me specifically
for this information. Your help is greatly appreciated!

On Thu, Sep 4, 2025 at 11:26 AM service@simsonn.com

Excellent, thanks for your help ?

On Thu, 4 Sept 2025, 14:27 General and sales enquiries,
Hi Dan Jones,    I do apologise for forgetting to provide you with the information you required. Might I ask if you still require it?

Hi there,

The pedals have arrived so I no longer need the information. I appreciate
your help nonetheless!

Thanks.

On Wed, 10 Sept 2025, 09:16 service@simsonn.com,

Hi there,

I have finally got round to installing my sim and I have only received two
of the three haptic reactors I ordered. I ordered through Amazon with order
number:
206-3837061-5129968

Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you.

Hi all at Simsonn,

Just wanted to ensure you've received my previous email.

Thank you for your help as always!
